title: Vienna / Wien
teaser: Dive into the capital of the Habsburg empire
description: With a population of almost 2 million, Vienna is the second largest German-speaking city and breathes history in every corner.

title: London
teaser: Explore one of the world's most famous cities
description: Being a tourist magnet, this city needs no further introduction.

title: Detroit
teaser: Top 10 of the cosmopolitan cities of the world
description: This US city is mainly known for the autombile industry. It hosts the GM's headquarters.

title: Reykjavík
teaser: The northernmost capital of the world and entry to Iceland
description: Iceland is a small island between Europe and America. It is best known for its nature and landscape which look almost alien.

title: Copenhagen / København
description: Copenhagen is the capital of Denmark and is located on Seenland which is one of the three main Danish islands.

title: Shanghai / 上海市
description: Although not being the capital of China, Shanghai is a good choice to for a China voyage. It can be reached very easily and many Western companies use it for their Chinese headquarters.
